reviewText: Great movie saw it about 50 years ago. Stars Gaston Santos who I personally met at one of his bullfights in Reynosa Tamaulipas, Mexico. Also stars a young Mauricio Garces the victim that Gaston helps clear of murder. Fast paced Mexican western. Back when Mexico made good movies.

Late 50's Spanish-language, Mexican-made (no subtitles) western.  A young cowboy comes to a village to find out who killed his best friend.  He comes across a town held in the grip of fear by a group of gangster-type cowpokes who force protection money from their victims and still brutalize them.  Our good guy set about to right wrongs and fight the evildoers.  The quality of the DVD is good, probably the best available.  Recommended for fans of the genre.
I do not normally buy old movies but lately my father has been asking for them. So i came here to find them. He is very satisfied and so am I.
